books.description: In the first volume of his presidential memoirs, Barack Obama offers personal reflections on his formative years and pivotal moments through his first term. Read by the author. 29 hours, 10 minutes unabridged.
books.title: A PROMISED LAND

books.author: Matthew McConaughey
books.description: The Academy Award-winning actor shares snippets from the diaries he kept over the last 35 years. Read by the author. 6 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: GREENLIGHTS

books.author: David Sedaris
books.description: A collection of the humorist’s essays including “Me Talk Pretty One Day” and “A Guy Walks Into a Bar Car.” Read by the author. 13 hours, 8 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE BEST OF ME

books.author: Isabel Wilkerson
books.description: The Pulitzer Prize-winning journalist reveals a rigid hierarchy in America today. Read by Robin Miles. 14 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CASTE

books.author: Sam Heughan and Graham McTavish
books.contributor: by Sam Heughan and Graham McTavish
books.description: The stars of “Outlander” use various means of travel to explore Scotland. Read by the authors. 10 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: CLANLANDS

books.author: Michelle Obama
books.description: The former first lady describes how she balanced work, family and her husband’s political ascent. Read by the author. 19 hours, 3 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BECOMING

books.author: Glennon Doyle
books.description: The activist and public speaker describes her journey of listening to her inner voice. Read by the author. 8 hours, 22 minutes unabridged.
books.title: UNTAMED

books.author: Michael J Fox
books.description: The actor discusses the challenges he has faced with Parkinson’s disease and other setbacks that caused him to reassess his outlook. Read by the author. 5 hours, 59 minutes unabridged.
books.title: NO TIME LIKE THE FUTURE

books.author: Dolly Parton with Robert K Oermann
books.contributor: by Dolly Parton with Robert K. Oermann
books.description: The country music icon offers insights on 175 of her songs. Read by Dolly Parton. 5 hours, 18 minutes unabridged.
books.title: DOLLY PARTON, SONGTELLER

books.author: Candace Owens
books.description: The conservative commentator makes her case that Black Americans should part ways with the Democratic Party. Read by the author. 6 hours, 51 minutes unabridged.
books.title: BLACKOUT

books.author: Alex Trebek
books.description: A memoir by the host of the TV game show “Jeopardy!,” from 1984 to 2020. Read by Ken Jennings and the author. 4 hours, 34 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE ANSWER IS ...

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.description: Applying the principles of Navy SEALs leadership training to any organization. Read by the authors. 8 hours, 15 minutes unabridged.
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Kamala Harris
books.description: A memoir by the daughter of immigrants who is now the vice president-elect. Read by the author. 9 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: THE TRUTHS WE HOLD

books.author: Malcolm Gladwell
books.description: Famous examples of miscommunication serve as the backdrop to explain potential conflicts. Read by the author. 8 hours, 42 minutes unabridged.
books.title: TALKING TO STRANGERS

books.author: Emmanuel Acho
books.description: A look at some questions and concepts needed to address systemic racism. Read by the author. 4 hours, 26 minutes unabridged.
books.title: UNCOMFORTABLE CONVERSATIONS WITH A BLACK MAN

books.author: Fareed Zakaria
books.title: TEN LESSONS FOR A POST-PANDEMIC WORLD

books.author: Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.contributor: by Jocko Willink and Leif Babin
books.title: EXTREME OWNERSHIP

books.author: Shea McGee and Syd McGee
books.contributor: by Shea McGee and Syd McGee
books.title: MAKE LIFE BEAUTIFUL

books.author: Steve Martin and Harry Bliss
books.contributor: by Steve Martin and Harry Bliss
books.description: The multi-award winning comedian teams up with the New Yorker cartoonist for this collection of humorous cartoons and comic strips.
books.title: A WEALTH OF PIGEONS

books.author: Raina Telgemeier
books.description: Raina finds her tummy trouble might be more than it first appears to be when she goes back to school.
books.title: GUTS

books.author: Jerry Craft
books.description: Jordan Banks, an artistically inclined seventh grader from Washington Heights, has a tough time navigating an upscale private school where diversity is low and maintaining his neighborhood friendships.
books.title: NEW KID

books.author: Kohei Horikoshi
books.description: Will Izuku Midoriya's chance encounter with a superhero change his fate? Most likely!
books.title: MY HERO ACADEMIA, VOL. 1

books.author: Jerry Craft
books.description: Drew Ellis finds he must work 10 times as hard as his privileged classmates at the Riverdale Academy Day School.
books.title: CLASS ACT

books.author: Ben Clanton
books.description: The fifth book in the Narwhal and Jelly series. The Merry Mermicorn, warm waffle pudding and a hunt for the perfect present.
books.title: HAPPY NARWHALIDAYS

books.author: Nathan Hale
books.description: The 10th book in the Nathan Hale’s Hazardous Tale series. Stories of Napoleon Bonaparte, the Haitian Revolution and the Louisiana Purchase.
books.title: BLADES OF FREEDOM

books.author: Ann M Martin
books.contributor: by Ann M. Martin. Illustrated by Katy Farina
books.description: After taking a tumble, Karen sets out to get her friends and someone famous to sign her cast.
books.title: BABY-SITTERS LITTLE SISTER: KAREN'S ROLLER SKATES

books.author: Raina Telgemeier
books.description: Raina experiences braces, boy troubles and other plagues of the sixth grade.
books.title: SMILE

books.author: Kohei Horikoshi
books.description: Midoriya can barely control the All Might’s abilities he inherited.
books.title: MY HERO ACADEMIA, VOL. 2

books.author: Koyoharu Gotouge
books.description: A young charcoal seller must avenge his family by destroying the demon that slaughtered them.
books.title: DEMON SLAYER: KIMETSU NO YAIBA, VOL. 1

books.author: Raina Telgemeier
books.description: Callie becomes the stage manager for her middle school’s production of "Moon Over Mississippi."
books.title: DRAMA

books.author: Yuval Noah Harari and David Vandermeulen
books.contributor: by Yuval Noah Harari and David Vandermeulen. Illustrated by Daniel Casanave
books.description: An illustrated adaptation of the book that looks at humankind’s creation and evolution.
books.title: SAPIENS: A GRAPHIC HISTORY

books.author: Kohei Horikoshi
books.description: Tomura fights the leader of the Meta Liberation Army.
books.title: MY HERO ACADEMIA, VOL. 25

books.author: Geoff Johns
books.contributor: by Geoff Johns. Illustrated by Jason Fabok
books.description: Barbara Gordon and Jason Todd join forces with the Dark Knight to take on multiple menaces.
books.title: BATMAN: THREE JOKERS

books.author: Christine Feehan
books.description: The leopard shifter Sevastyan Amurov protects Flambe Carver from a stalker.
books.title: LEOPARD'S RAGE

books.author: Michael Connelly
books.description: Harry Bosch and Renée Ballard return to take up a case that held the attention of Bosch’s mentor.
books.title: THE NIGHT FIRE

books.author: Danielle Steel
books.description: Alexandra Wickham, an espionage agent during World War II, must keep her secret hidden into the Cold War.
books.title: SPY

books.author: Lisa Gardner
books.description: D.D. Warren and Flora Dane join the F.B.I. agent Kimberly Quincy’s taskforce.
books.title: WHEN YOU SEE ME

books.author: Debbie Macomber
books.description: Two holiday stories: “Christmas Letters” and “Call Me Mrs. Miracle.”
books.title: A CHRISTMAS MESSAGE

books.author: Jonathan Kellerman
books.description: The 35th book in the Alex Delaware series. Four unrelated victims are found slaughtered in a limousine.
books.title: THE MUSEUM OF DESIRE

books.author: Diana Palmer
books.description: The 10th book in the Wyoming Men series. The independently wealthy Ida Merridan’s past catches up with her as she gets to know the rancher Jake McGuire.
books.title: WYOMING TRUE

books.author: James Patterson and James O Born
books.contributor: by James Patterson and James O. Born
books.description: Three thrillers: "Hidden," "Malicious" and "Malevolent."
books.title: THE RIVER MURDERS

books.author: Fern Michaels
books.description: Joy Preston must take over a bed and breakfast where it is rumored that spirits of deceased loved ones might visit the guests.
books.title: SPIRIT OF THE SEASON

books.author: Nora Roberts
books.description: Two winter romance stories: “Rebellion” and “In From the Cold.”
books.title: A MACGREGOR CHRISTMAS

books.author: William W Johnstone and JA Johnstone
books.contributor: by William W. Johnstone and J.A. Johnstone
books.description: Duff MacCallister’s cousins are held up by two outlaw gangs as they travel from Cheyenne to Chugwater for the holidays.
books.title: A MACCALLISTER CHRISTMAS

books.author: Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.contributor: by Greer Hendricks and Sarah Pekkanen
books.description: The story of a love triangle is told from several points of view.
books.title: THE WIFE BETWEEN US

books.author: Lori Wilde
books.description: The 12th book in the Twilight, Texas series. A snowstorm puts the wedding planner Aria Alzate and the rigid Remington Lockhart in close proximity.
books.title: THE CHRISTMAS BACKUP PLAN

books.author: Marc Cameron
books.description: President Jack Ryan learns of a plot against America when he tries to help an old friend who has been arrested in Indonesia.
books.title: TOM CLANCY: CODE OF HONOR

books.author: James Patterson
books.description: The 27th book in the Alex Cross series. Copycat crimes make the detective question whether an innocent man was executed.
books.title: CRISS CROSS

books.contributor: by Katherine Applegate. Illustrated by Patricia Castelao
